body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IFRS 8, is contained in Part A of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 January 2009. The text of the Accompanying Guidance on IFRS 8 is contained in Part B of this edition. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
APPENDICES TO THE BASIS FOR CONCLUSIONS
A Background information and basis for conclusions of the US Financial Accounting Standards Board on SFAS 131
B Amendments to the Basis for Conclusions on other IFRSs
